tool_description: Forecasts baseload electricity demand using econometric models and long-term consumption trends independent of weather variations.

historical_baseload.description: Historical baseload demand data in MW

economic_indicators.description: Economic indicators (GDP growth, industrial production, etc.)

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: Need minimum 168 hours (1 week) of baseload data.
Invalid forecast horizon: Must be between 1 and 365 days.
Data quality issues: Historical baseload data contains invalid values.
Economic indicator mismatch: Economic indicators array length doesn't match expected format.
usage: Provide historical_baseload array and forecast_horizon_days. Optionally include economic_indicators. Returns baseload demand forecasts with confidence intervals.

baseload_forecast_mw.description: Forecasted baseload demand values in MW
